sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Container, Col, Image, Row, Card, Button} from "react-bootstrap" import bigStar from '../assets/bigStar.png' const DevicePage = () => { const device = {id: 1, name: 'Iphone 12 pro', price: 25000, rating: 5, img: 'https://www.purposechurch.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/fpo400x300.png'} const description = [ {id: 1, title: 'оперативная память', description: '5 гб'}, {id: 2, title: 'камера', description: '12 мп'}, {id: 3, title: 'процессор', description: 'пентиум'}, {id: 4, title: 'количество ядер', description: '2'}, {id: 5, title: 'фккумулятор', description: '4000'}, ] return (

{device.name}

{device.rating}

от: {device.price} грн.

 {description.map((info, index) => {info.title}: {info.description} )}
) } export default DevicePage //rafce
